question:
Consider the following statements about DARPAN-Digital Advancement of Rural Post Office for a New India:
  1. The scheme has been launched for financial inclusion of rural people
  2. It is an initiative under Ministry of Finance
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>Second statement is incorrect.</u> DARPAN or “Digital Advancement of Rural Post Office for a New India” is an initiative under the Ministry of Communications. <u>First statement is correct.</u> The scheme aims of financial inclusion to rural population and it is targeted to complete the project by March, 2018. Under this project, the ministry will try to increase the rural reach of the Department of Posts and enable Branch Post Offices (BOs) to increase traffic of all financial remittances, savings accounts, Rural Postal Life Insurance, and Cash Certificates; improve mail operations processes by allowing for automated booking and delivery of accountable article; increase revenue using retail post business; provide third party applications; and make disbursements for social security schemes such as MGNREGS.
